DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect cranberry juice central peripheral blood pressure , indices arterial stiffness , lipid lipoprotein concentration size characteristic , HDL function . The investigator hypothesize bioactive compound cranberry juice may elicit beneficial effect blood pressure arterial health , well LDL-C HDL function .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Cranberry Juice Cardiovascular Risk Factors
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose conduct 2-period randomize , crossover , placebo-controlled study evaluate effect cranberry juice central peripheral blood pressure , indices arterial stiffness , lipid lipoprotein concentration size characteristic , HDL function . Eligibility require non-smoking men woman 30 65 year age BMI great equal 18 less equal 39 , total cholesterol 240 mg/dL , triglycerides 350 mg/dL , systolic blood pressure 120 159 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure 80 99 mmHg . Subjects undergo randomized treatment include 500 mL/d cranberry juice beverage 500 mL/d color taste match placebo beverage . The two 8 12 week treatment period separate 8 week washout .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men woman 3065 year age 2 . BMI ≥ 18 ≤ 39 kg/m^2 3 . Total cholesterol 240 mg/dL 4 . Triglycerides 350 mg/dL 5 . Nonsmokers 6 . At least one following : 1 . Systolic blood pressure 120159 mmHg 2 . Diastolic blood pressure 8099 mmHg 1 . History acute chronic inflammatory condition heart disease , kidney disease , liver disease , autoimmune disorder , thyroid disease ( unless control medication blood result within previous 6 month provide ) 2 . History diabetes mellitus ( and/or fast glucose > 126 mg/dL screen ) 3 . Stage II hypertension ( blood pressure ≥ 160/100 mmHg ) 4 . Lactation , pregnancy , desire become pregnant study 5 . Unwillingness discontinue nutritional supplement , herb , vitamin unless approve investigator 6 . Use medications/supplements elevated lipid , blood pressure , glucose 7 . Chronic use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory immunosuppressant medication 8 . Conditions require use steroid 9 . Unwillingness refrain blood donation prior study 10 . Any medical condition abnormal laboratory value judge clinically significant investigator 11 . Allergy sensitivity cranberry juice ingredient study beverage
